methods.description: Get a list of filtered articles

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Accepts keywords to use as a search query.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Page size (the number of items to return per page).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Returns the most popular articles in the last N days. 'top' indicates the number of days since publication of the articles returned. This param can be used in conjuction with q or tag.

responses.description: Representation of an article returned in a list

apiDescription: A plugin that recommends resources like articles or users to a user using ChatGP.
